full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GYI SGO NAS RTA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS LHUN GRUB RTA GA-YANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS BSAM PA LHUN GRUB RTA GA-YANG 'DI NI SNGON 'DOL YUL DU RTA GA-YANG SHIN TU RGUD NAS BKRA MI SHIS PA'I GOD KHA MANG BYUNG BA'I RTA ZANG LA SEMS CAN GYI DON DU BTZUN PA SA RTI KAR MA MING CAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SLOB DPON PADMA DKAR GYIS GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO MU TIG PHRENG BA SOGS BZHI LA BLTAS TE 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN BDE SKYID LDAN PAR SHOG ,SA MA YA RGYA RGYA RGYA: AiTHI SHU BHAm MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
